Disease Stage Classification

Select the current stage to adjust AI companion behavior and care protocols

The Global Deterioration Scale (GDS) helps match care strategies to your loved one's current needs. This setting adjusts how the AI companion responds and what safety protocols are active.

Clinical Note

GDS 5-6: Requires ADL assistance. MMSE typically 10-18. BPSD common. Implement sundowning protocols 4-8 PM.
